See the License for the specific language governing permissions and limitations under the License. --> The expressions module is new to Lucene 4.6. It provides an API for dynamically computing per-document values based on string expressions. The module is organized in two sections: The Expressions Module for Apache Lucene - The abstractions and simple utilities for common operations like sorting on an expression <xref:Lucene.Net.Expressions.JS> - A compiler for a subset of JavaScript expressions For sample code showing how to use the API, see <xref:Lucene.Net.Expressions.Expression>.
